info.description: Backend API for Seculoc, a rental management platform.
info.title: Seculoc API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Switch between owner and tenant context
Send an invitation to a tenant

get.description: Get details for an invitation by token
Get all active leases where the authenticated user is the tenant
Generate and download the lease contract (HTML/PDF)
Get all properties belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a property listing (Long Term or Seasonal)

put.description:
Soft delete a property belonging to the authenticated user
Update details of an existing property

delete.description:
Soft delete a property belonging to the authenticated user
Update details of an existing property

post.description: Consume credit to run solvency check on candidate and send invitation email
Cancel a pending check and refund credit to property or global wallet

get.description: Get all solvency checks for the current owner, optionally filtered by property
Allows candidate to see the solvency check request

post.description: Endpoint for mocking Open Banking data callback
Subscribe user to Discovery, Serenity, or Premium plan
